product_name: Planet Bike Superflash - Red / Blaze Bike Light Set
long_description: Improve your visibility after dark with this combo light set featuring a bright white front light and a Super Flash(TM) taillight. Stream-lined, half-watt Blaze(TM) LED front light is many times brighter than a standard white LED. Features both flashing and steady modes; up to 100 hours of run time. QuickCam(TM) mounting bracket accommodates tool-free mounting on handlebar; fits 25.4mm - 31.8mm handlebars. Super Flash rear light contains a half-watt Blaze(TM) LED plus two Extreme(TM) LEDs for visibility up to one mile. Compact vertical design is weatherproof, lightweight and durable. Flashing and steady modes; unique, eye-catching flash pattern. Comes with bike mounts and clip mount. Includes two AA and two AAA batteries.
short_description: Improve your visibility after dark with this combo light set featuring a bright white front light and a Super Flash(TM) taillight.
